Enum SolrQueryParserBase.MagicFieldName

  • java.lang.Object

    public static enum SolrQueryParserBase.MagicFieldName
extends Enum<SolrQueryParserBase.MagicFieldName>
    Identifies the list of all known "magic fields" that trigger special parsing behavior
